title: this is the only board i can make a post on even though i'm level 30
body: it says i need to be level 6 or higher to create a discussion in team recruitment but i'm level 30 pls

replies.body: An account needs to sync with the boards when posting for the first time, and it looks you're now sync!  Let me know if you still have issues posting.
I think this needs to fixed with the boards, because you cant post unless you make a post in a help & support section.
